Legacy Document

Inside Macintosh: Programmer's Guide to MacApp / Part 2 - Working With MacApp

Chapter 30 -
Working With Balloon Help

This chapter describes how MacApp supports Macintosh Balloon Help onscreen assistance. It also demonstrates how to

  • specify Balloon Help for a view
  • change the help resource associated with a view
  • specify Balloon Help for a menu

For related information, see "Cursor Handling," beginning on page 221, which describes how MacApp automatically tracks the cursor and gives each view a chance to change the cursor image while the cursor is over that view.
